verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w* drew \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they might \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w surnamed|strong="G1941"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he went his \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, and \w communed|strong="G4814"\w* with the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w captains|strong="G4755"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he might \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w glad|strong="G5463"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w covenanted|strong="G4934"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w money|strong="G0694"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w*, \w when|strong="G3739"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be \w killed|strong="G2380"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w and prepare|strong="G2090"\+w* \+w us|strong="G2254"\+w* \+w the passover|strong="G3957"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w we may eat|strong="G5315"\+w*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="G2309"\w* that we \w prepare|strong="G2090"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w when ye|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w are entered|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the city|strong="G4172"\+w*, \+w there shall|strong="G4876"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w meet|strong="G4876"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w bearing|strong="G0941"\+w* \+w a pitcher|strong="G2765"\+w* \+w of water|strong="G5204"\+w*; \+w follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w where|strong="G3757"\+w* \+w he entereth in|strong="G1531"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall say|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w unto the goodman|strong="G3617"\+w* \+w of the house|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w The Master|strong="G1320"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the guestchamber|strong="G2646"\+w*, \+w where|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I shall eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w the passover|strong="G3957"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3101"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And he|strong="G2548"\+w* \+w shall shew|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w a large|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w upper room|strong="G0508"\+w* \+w furnished|strong="G4766"\+w*: \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w make ready|strong="G2090"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, he sat \w down|strong="G0377"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I will|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w any more|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w thereof|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w it be fulfilled|strong="G4137"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* of \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I will|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the fruit|strong="G1081"\+w* \+w of the vine|strong="G0288"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w shall come|strong="G2064"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, and gave \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*, and \w brake|strong="G2806"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w This|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w body|strong="G4983"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*: \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w remembrance|strong="G0364"\+w* \+w of me|strong="G1699"\+w*.\wj*

\w Likewise|strong="G5615"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w supper|strong="G1172"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w This|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w cup|strong="G4221"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w the new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w testament|strong="G1242"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w blood|strong="G0129"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is shed|strong="G1632"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w But|strong="G4133"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w the hand|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w of him that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w betrayeth|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the table|strong="G5132"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w enquire|strong="G4802"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* it \w was|strong="G1498"\w* that \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* this \w thing|strong="G5124"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* a \w strife|strong="G5379"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w which|strong="G5101"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w accounted|strong="G1380"\w* the \w greatest|strong="G3187"\w*.

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+add shall\+add* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+add be\+add* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is greatest|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w among|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w let him be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w the younger|strong="G3501"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that is chief|strong="G2233"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w doth serve|strong="G1247"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w whether|strong="G5101"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w greater|strong="G3187"\+w*, \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w sitteth at meat|strong="G0345"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w serveth|strong="G1247"\+w*? \+add is\+add* \+w not|strong="G3780"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w sitteth at meat|strong="G0345"\+w*? \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w among|strong="G3319"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w serveth|strong="G1247"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And I|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w appoint|strong="G1303"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w a kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath appointed|strong="G1303"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w*;\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Simon|strong="G4613"\+w*, \+w Simon|strong="G4613"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w hath desired|strong="G1809"\+w* \+add to have\+add* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w that he may sift|strong="G4617"\+w* \+add you\+add* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w wheat|strong="G4621"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w be accomplished|strong="G5055"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w*, \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he was reckoned|strong="G3049"\+w* \+w among|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w the transgressors|strong="G0459"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the things|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w concerning|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w an end|strong="G5056"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he came \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w went|strong="G4198"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* he was \w wont|strong="G1485"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
